project.x-prompt: The name of the project to add docker to

dockerRepoOrUser.description: The user or repo to upload the docker image to

minikube.description: Whether or not to add post targets for minikube.

baseDockerImage.description: The base docker image to use in the generated dockerfile

runVariables.description: When running the docker image, this is an comma delimited string used to set environment variables within the container
